Text: hey man you don't mind me upping the main 3 ultimates comics lines do you? just i was looking for back issues for them and it was a bit of a pain so i thought i'd pack them all together. don't want to step on anybodys toes if you know what i mean.

degu2012, TPB is for everyone. you post whatever you feel like posting. i think new compilations of the ultimate titles are great contributions. you could also do the ultimate comics iron man miniseries. do some more torrents whenever you feel like it.

Can you upload Joe Casey's Wildcats 3.0 and Automatic Kafka? It'd be greatly appreciated.

Also, Judas Coin OGN by Walt Simonson would be a great upload...just saying :D


Thanks for all the awesome comics!
